Healthcare Facilities

When it comes to Hospitals and Healthcare Facilities, Accuro pro has best-in-class solutions. Accuro pro excels at providing Professional Liability insurance.

Accuro pro experienced team of underwriters, claims staff, and risk management experts understand the unique needs facing healthcare facilities and will work closely with you to structure a program to make sure all of your needs are met.

Accuro pro provides Professional and General Liability coverage options to healthcare facilities across NY, CT, PA and NJ.

Download an Application (New York Only):

  • Healthcare Facility
  • Hospital
  • Long-Term Care
  • General Liability

Our Products

  • Professional Liability Insurance (Claims-Made and Occurrence)
  • General Liability Coverage (Claims-Made and Occurrence - Occurrence only in New York)
  • Excess Coverage
  • “Nose” and “Tail” Coverage
  • Deductibles Available
  • VAP Premium Discounts
  • A variety of limits are available
  • Payment Options

Product Benefits

Availability may vary by state
  • With exceptional savings through our premium discount program, Accuro pro offers competitive premiums in virtually every specialty.
  • Part of a group? Accuro pro offers rate and form flexibility to qualifying groups and a streamlined application process for group practices.
  • Claims-Made, Occurrence, and Modified Claims-Made coverage options.
  • General Liability coverage available for your entity when you purchase Professional Liability coverage.
  • Coverage for your medical director, partnership and corporation, ambulatory surgery center, and others.
  • Coverage for administrative (disciplinary) actions at no additional cost.
  • Aggressive claims handling by a dedicated & experienced claims team.
  • Coverage options for the entire healthcare team.
  • Acess to actionable insights through the Candello MPL data coding collaborative.
  • Access to our award-winning risk management programs.
  • Free consultation services with Accuro pro risk management experts and attorneys.
  • Full suite of online policy management tools through Accuro pro Client Portal.
  • Free one-to-one and group peer support.
  • Access to Accuro pro Physicians’ Club events.
